ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
instructions: In a saucepan over medium heat, mix the tomato sauce, honey, soy sauce, vinegar, corn syrup, Worcestershire sauce, hoisin sauce, cayenne pepper, salt, and pepper.
title: Ryan's Gourmet BBQ Sauce

normalized_ingredients.InF3Pp1nc: salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

steps: In a saucepan over medium heat, mix the tomato sauce, honey, soy sauce, vinegar, corn syrup, Worcestershire sauce, hoisin sauce, cayenne pepper, salt, and pepper. Cook 30 minutes, until thickened. Cool, and use immediately.
